lines.text: Mom, Dad, the drugs are more important than you!
Are you proud of me now? Do I measure up?
I want you to know something, officer. I wouldn't print anything like this. I mean really... candles stuck in all her privates? That's just sick.
The cops followed you up here you dumb nigger, you!
Hey, who the fuck you're calling "dumb", asshole breath?
[throws his cocaine up in the dope dealer's face]
Can't flush a fuckin' toilet, and he's calling me dumb.
